other_tests.findings: Multiple mild non-bleeding diverticula with mixed openings were seen in the sigmoid colon and ascending colon; biopsies with normal mucosa throughout the colon.

other_tests.procedure_name: CT scan of the abdomen and pelvis
other_tests.findings: Short segment of bowel wall thickening with pericolonic fat stranding and diverticulosis; equivocal evidence for tiny extraluminal gas adjacent to the area of inflammation; no evidence of ileus or obstruction; trace free fluid in the pelvis.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Tiny atelectatic foci at the lung bases unchanged from prior study.
